name: Sohai Detective
description:
Description: My first foray into programming with C++.

Sohai Detective is an ASCII based, RPG text adventure game made during my naïve yet memorable years.

This game may be far from polished but it holds much memories for me as it is one of the first games that I have ever created and contains plenty of inside puns between me and my friends.

Date:  April, 2015

Duration: 1 week
